meanings.sent1: Arginines are important for building proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: I need to eat foods rich in arginines to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the arginines go to the party? Because they heard it was a protein-packed event!
meanings.sent4: Her love for arginines was as strong as the bonds they form in proteins.
meanings.sent5: The arginines danced together, creating a strong structure like proteins in our muscles.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of arginines on the body.
meanings.sent2: Arginines are commonly found in dietary supplements.
meanings.sent3: The arginines gathered for a meeting to discuss their roles in the body.
meanings.sent4: In the field of nutrition, arginines play a crucial role in health.
meanings.sent5: The jar contained a mix of arginines, ready to be used for research purposes.
